title: Rare unseen California 1940s in color [60fps, Remastered] w/sound design added
description:
I colorized, restored and created a sound design for this video of Wonderful Trip to California 1940s, We start with amazing scenes of the city of San Francisco: downtown and residential areas and Bunker Hill, Los angeles  , then we go through the Pacific Ocean Park,  Many great amusement park attractions, rides, snack bars and games

Video Restoration Process:
✔ FPS boosted to 60 frames per second 
✔ Image resolution boosted up to HD 
✔ Improved video sharpness and brightness 
✔ Colorized only for the ambiance (not historically accurate)
✔added sound only for the ambiance
✔restoration:(stabilisation,denoise,cleand,deblur) 

Please, be aware that colorization colors are not real and fake, colorization was made only for the ambiance and do not represent real historical data.

B&W Video Source from: Internet Archive
B&W Video Source: https://archive.org/details/pet1038r4
B&W Video Source:https://archive.org/details/pet1058r4

title: Paris, France 1930s in color [60fps, Remastered] w/sound design added
description:
I colorized, restored and created a sound design for this video of Home Movie Paris, France 1930s, we have street scenes in Paris. The Seine. Book market. Traffic in the street with a parked Coca-Cola truck. Stores. The Madeleine church. Arc de Triomphe and café. The Figaro. River boats. Fountain. Children playing. Outdoor café. Pedestrians crossing the street. American-Express-Co building,  after "The World's Fair in Paris" Panoramic view, Eiffel Tower. Crowds attend the Universal Exhibition, After Cherbourg in France, we have workers on bicycles. Sea front. Clock tower. American visitors (the Major family) pose for the camera. HAS, train station. Scouts. Sign: "VICHY Mai Octobre VICHY" People are waiting in the station. 

 After "The 'Columbus (SS Columbus) ' is coming" A large German ship is approaching the port of Cherbourg.

Views of Paris 00:00-05:03
World's Fair 1937 05:03-5:57
Cherbourg 5:57-7:24
Columbus (SS Columbus) 7:24-8:23

Video Restoration Process:
✔ FPS boosted to 60 frames per second 
✔ Image resolution boosted up to HD 
✔ Improved video sharpness and brightness 
✔ Colorized only for the ambiance (not historically accurate)
✔added sound design  only for the ambiance
✔restoration:(stabilisation,denoise,cleand,deblur) 

Please, be aware that colorization colors are not real and fake, colorization was made only for the ambiance and do not represent real historical data.

B&W Video Source from: United States Holocaust Memorial Museum, gift of Ann Major
B&W Video Source: https://collections.ushmm.org/search/catalog/irn596147
